Reverse Proxy Authenticator plugin for Sonar

This plugin allows delegation of SonarQube authentication to the reverse proxy via HTTP Header. See Implementation Details.

This was named after the Jenkins Reverse Proxy Auth Plugin.

Last Published: 2014-07-04
Version: 1.0.1-SNAPSHOT
